title: PenguinR: A Comprehensive Collection of Penguin Datasets for Statistical Analysis and Experimental Design
text: PenguinR package offers rich diverse collection datasets focused penguin biology, ecology, behavioral studies. includes data species morphology, clutch completion, blood isotope composition, heart rate measurements collected adult foraging penguins near Palmer Station, Antarctica. package contains wide variety data types, including morphometric, physiological, ecological, experimental datasets. datasets encompass flipper length, body mass, bill dimensions, reproductive success indicators, metabolic activity, isotopic composition, enabling detailed exploration penguin biology lens statistical analysis experimental design.

title: PenguinR: A Comprehensive Collection of Penguin Datasets for Statistical Analysis and Experimental Design
text: dataset PenguinR package uses suffix denote type R object: _df: data frame

title: PenguinR: A Comprehensive Collection of Penguin Datasets for Statistical Analysis and Experimental Design
text: selected example datasets included PenguinR package: penguins_df: Size Measurements Adult Foraging Penguins near Palmer Station, Antarctica. penguins_raw_df: Penguin Size, Clutch, Blood Isotope Data Foraging Adults near Palmer Station, Antarctica. peng_df: Size Measurements Penguins near Palmer Station, Antarctica. pinguinos_df: Penguin Heart Rate.

previous_headings: Introduction > Data Visualization with PenguinR Data
what: Size Measurements for Penguins near Palmer Station, Antarctica
title: PenguinR: A Comprehensive Collection of Penguin Datasets for Statistical Analysis and Experimental Design
code: # Prepare summary or filtered data (optional) peng_summary <- peng_df %>%   filter(!is.na(flipper_length), !is.na(body_mass)) %>%   group_by(species, sex) %>%   summarise(     mean_flipper = mean(flipper_length, na.rm = TRUE),     mean_mass = mean(body_mass, na.rm = TRUE),     .groups = "drop"   )  # Scatterplot: Body mass vs Flipper length by species and sex ggplot(peng_df, aes(x = flipper_length, y = body_mass, color = species, shape = sex)) +   geom_point(size = 2, alpha = 0.8) +   geom_smooth(method = "lm", se = FALSE, linetype = "dashed", color = "black") +   labs(     title = "Body Mass vs Flipper Length in Penguins",     subtitle = "Data by Species and Sex near Palmer Station, Antarctica",     x = "Flipper Length (mm)",     y = "Body Mass (g)",     color = "Species",     shape = "Sex"   ) +   theme_minimal() +   theme(     plot.title = element_text(face = "bold"),     axis.text.x = element_text(angle = 45, hjust = 1)   ) #> `geom_smooth()` using formula = 'y ~ x'

title: PenguinR: A Comprehensive Collection of Penguin Datasets for Statistical Analysis and Experimental Design
text: PenguinR package provides comprehensive well-structured collection datasets centered penguin biology ecology, designed support learning, teaching, research statistical analysis experimental design. integrating data morphology, reproductive success, blood isotope composition, heart rate, package offers users opportunity apply wide range statistical methods—including descriptive analysis, ANOVA, regression, multivariate techniques—using authentic ecological data. Whether educational use, methodological demonstration, reproducible research, PenguinR serves valuable tool bridges data science biology, helping users develop analytical skills exploring fascinating world penguins near Palmer Station, Antarctica.

what: Size Measurements for Adult Foraging Penguins near Palmer Station, Antarctica — penguins_df
title: Size Measurements for Adult Foraging Penguins near Palmer Station, Antarctica — penguins_df
text: dataset, penguins_df, data frame measurements adult penguins three species three islands Palmer Archipelago, Antarctica. Variables include flipper length, body mass, bill length depth, sex, year observation. observations may contain missing values.

title: Size Measurements for Adult Foraging Penguins near Palmer Station, Antarctica — penguins_df
Size Measurements for Adult Foraging Penguins near Palmer Station, Antarctica — penguins_df
text: data frame 344 observations 8 variables: species Penguin species (factor 3 levels). island Island observation (factor 3 levels). bill_length_mm Bill length millimeters (numeric). bill_depth_mm Bill depth millimeters (numeric). flipper_length_mm Flipper length millimeters (integer). body_mass_g Body mass grams (integer). sex Sex penguin (factor 2 levels). year Year observation (integer).

title: Size Measurements for Adult Foraging Penguins near Palmer Station, Antarctica — penguins_df
text: Data taken palmerpenguins package version 0.1.1

title: Size Measurements for Adult Foraging Penguins near Palmer Station, Antarctica — penguins_df
text: columns penguins_df subset extensive penguins_raw data frame, also includes nesting observations blood isotope data. differences column names data types two datasets. See Format section details. dataset name kept 'penguins_df' avoid confusion datasets R ecosystem. naming convention helps distinguish dataset part PenguinR package assists users identifying specific characteristics. suffix 'df' indicates dataset data frame. original content modified way.

what: Penguin Size, Clutch, and Blood Isotope Data for Foraging Adults near Palmer Station, Antarctica — penguins_raw_df
title: Penguin Size, Clutch, and Blood Isotope Data for Foraging Adults near Palmer Station, Antarctica — penguins_raw_df
text: dataset, penguins_raw_df, data frame containing comprehensive biological data adult penguins observed near Palmer Station, Antarctica. includes size measurements, clutch completion status, blood isotope values, additional observational metadata. dataset covers three penguin species three islands Palmer Archipelago.

title: Penguin Size, Clutch, and Blood Isotope Data for Foraging Adults near Palmer Station, Antarctica — penguins_raw_df
Penguin Size, Clutch, and Blood Isotope Data for Foraging Adults near Palmer Station, Antarctica — penguins_raw_df
text: data frame 344 observations 17 variables: studyName Name study project. Sample Number Unique numeric sample identifier. Species Species name (character). Region Region Palmer Archipelago (character). Island Island observation (character). Stage Stage breeding observation period (character). Individual ID Unique penguin identifier (character). Clutch Completion Clutch completion status (character). Date Egg Date egg recorded (Date). Culmen Length (mm) Bill length millimeters (numeric). Culmen Depth (mm) Bill depth millimeters (numeric). Flipper Length (mm) Flipper length millimeters (numeric). Body Mass (g) Body mass grams (numeric). Sex Sex penguin (character). Delta 15 N (o/oo) Nitrogen isotope ratio δ15N (per mil). Delta 13 C (o/oo) Carbon isotope ratio δ13C (per mil). Comments Additional notes remarks (character).

title: Penguin Size, Clutch, and Blood Isotope Data for Foraging Adults near Palmer Station, Antarctica — penguins_raw_df
text: Data taken palmerpenguins package version 0.1.1

title: Penguin Size, Clutch, and Blood Isotope Data for Foraging Adults near Palmer Station, Antarctica — penguins_raw_df
text: columns penguins_raw_df extend penguins_df dataset, adding details study name, individual ID, clutch information, isotope composition (δ15N δ13C), additional observational notes. variables include missing values. dataset name kept 'penguins_raw_df' avoid confusion datasets R ecosystem. naming convention helps distinguish dataset part PenguinR package assists users identifying specific characteristics. suffix 'df' indicates dataset data frame. original content modified way.

Size Measurements for Penguins near Palmer Station, Antarctica — peng_df

title: Penguin Heart Rate — pinguinos_df
text: dataset, pinguinos_df, data frame containing slopes regressions mass-specific metabolic rate heart rate three groups Macaroni Penguins. data summarize physiological relationships metabolic cardiac activity different breeding sex conditions.
